column4: Hi! I need to set-up a FTP server for a class, and I have a VPS running Ubuntu. I installed vsftpd, it worked, but now I need to create virtual users. But I can't install the package libdb4.4, it says it is not found
Can anyone help me getting started installing vsftpd?
sudo apt-get install vsftpd
but I need to install libdb4.4 to create virtual users, but it says it is not found
!info libdb4.4 | gabrielR
it is there
but it says E: Couldn't find package libdb4.4 what am I doing wrong? :(
what version of ubuntu ?
could it be 2.6.18-12-fza-686-bigmem ?
do "lsb_release -a"   but
with a 2.6.18 kernel ?? but anyway if its 8.10 the package is there in universe
go to system>Administration>Software Sources make sure universe is enabled on the first tab
it seems I can't get any GUI since i'm on a VPS.. how do I do that in command line?
check the /etc/apt/sources.list file
I have "intrepid main", "intrepid-updates main" and "intrepid-security main"
seems you do not have universe.... very weird
how can I add it?
add this twoo lines. deb http://es.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ intrepid universe
deb http://es.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ intrepid-updates universe
you do not have those lines comented out ? in the file?
no not at all
